name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.image.parallel.threads
description:
The number of threads to use when dfs.image.parallel.load is
        enabled. This setting should be less than
        dfs.image.parallel.target.sections. The optimal number of
        threads will depend on the hardware and environment.

name: dfs.namenode.replication.work.multiplier.per.iteration
description:
*Note*: Advanced property. Change with caution.
    This determines the total amount of block transfers to begin in
    parallel at a DN, for replication, when such a command list is being
    sent over a DN heartbeat by the NN. The actual number is obtained by
    multiplying this multiplier with the total number of live nodes in the
    cluster. The result number is the number of blocks to begin transfers
    immediately for, per DN heartbeat. This number can be any positive,
    non-zero integer.

name: seq.io.sort.factor
description:
The number of streams to merge at once while sorting
      files using SequenceFile.Sorter.
      This determines the number of open file handles.

name: dfs.qjournal.start-segment.timeout.ms
description: Quorum timeout in milliseconds for starting a log segment.

name: dfs.client.write.max-packets-in-flight
description: The maximum number of DFSPackets allowed in flight.

name: hadoop.http.idle_timeout.ms
description: NN/JN/DN Server connection timeout in milliseconds.
